entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] `CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToNonWasmPageComeBackAndHitAgain` gets stuck #87155
  • [API Proposal]: UnicodeJsonEncoder #87153
  • [API Proposal]: Uri : ISpanFormattable #87151
    8.0.0
  • Support Meter and Instrument Tags in MetricsEventSource #87150
    8.0.0
  • Add a SPMI collection for pre-AVX512 hardware #87145
  • Emit a diagnostic when encountering JsonConverAttribute annotations with inaccessible converter type constructors. #87140
    8.0.0
  • Interop generators don't generate calls to custom marshallers for elements of blittable type #87139
  • "Unsafe" in UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping is misleading from a security standpoint, in both directions #87138
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Generator does not warn on invalid uses of GeneratedComClassAttribute #87137
  • SQL Impersonation run failed with System.IO.FileLoadExceptions at .NET single file app #87132
  • Test failure readytorun\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\CpuId_R2R_Avx2\\CpuId_R2R_Avx2 #87118
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #87117
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/VectorAdd_ro/VectorAdd_ro #87116
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Text.Json is adding EqualityContract properties metadata for records #77675
    Future
  • JsonSourceGenerationMode.Metadata emits references to internal members from another assembly #66679
    8.0.0
  • NAOT publish build has a 1MB size delta between reflection free and not (+50% total size) #82607
    Future
  • native\myproject.ilc.rsp exited with code -2147483645. #87122
  • System.Text.Json's default enum converter handles key serialization inconsistently #87129
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' when compiling SSE heavy code targeting ARM64 #58861
    8.0.0
  • outerloop-nightly is broken because "native test components" is unavailable #85263
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests_net8.0_x86 test failed in CI #87102
  • TagList.GetEnumerator() allocates #87022
    Future
  • Unable to connect to SQL Server using Apline 3.17 dotnet image. Encryption(ssl/tls) handshake failed SqlException. #87123
  • Localization cultures (en-AU) not installing under Alpine 3.17 #87128
  • Libraries like HttpClient use legacy activity creation, requiring hacks in OpenTelemetry SDK #86873
  • MacOS - System.Net.Security - No usable version of libssl was found #83650
    Future
  • Using JsonTypeInfo<object> with JsonSerializerContext configured throws error during serialization steps #87073
    8.0.0
  • Adding JsonIgnoreAttribute to `new` property fails with ArgumentException #76268
    Future
  • [JIT] x64 InitValueNumStoreStatics is 261k #85953
    8.0.0
  • Question: Thread safety of X509Certificate2 class #87085
  • Trimmer doesn't warn on reflection access to RUC override method #86008
    8.0.0
  • .Net 6 performance of CreateSpecificCulture significantly slower than .net framework and .net core 3.1 #87110
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix trim analyzer warning for inferred type arguments #87156
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87154
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87152
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fix NativeAOT support for JsonStringEnumConverter. #87149
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add UncodeJsonEncoder (fixes #42847). #87147
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, community-contribution
  • Add marshalling tests and warn if interface is partial #87146
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update area-owners.json to reflect change in area-owners.md #87144
    area-Meta
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle Vector multiplication for long/ulong as intrinsic on pre-AVX512 hardware #87142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Move DynamicCodeSupport default into aot targets #87135
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix handling of CreateScalarUnsafe for embedded broadcast #87134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono][interp] Add new call fast path opcodes #87133
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Ensure the CPUID tests cover a couple hwintrinsic disablement edge cases #87127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [VM] Fix potential undefined behavior #87119
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Documentation for the HotColdMap section #87023
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix IDE0001 / IDE0002 (simplify names) in corelib #87106
    area-Meta
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix a number of accessibility resolution issues in the source generator. #87136
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Do not use ValueTuple in SynchronizationContext #87120
    area-System.Threading
  • [nativeaot][tests] Update bundle zip path for NativeAOT sample app #87049
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove unnecessary suppressions in APICompat files #87094
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Set .env variables in corerun prior to CLR init #85220
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fold obj.GetType to a constant #87101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [VM] Fix potential double free #86207
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid bloom filter checks for IndexOfAnyExcept in ProbabilisticMap #85203
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Ensure JsonSerializerOptions always returns a JsonTypeInfo for `object`. #87093
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix a few Parse uses to be TryParse #87105
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][non-icu] Revert `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #87007
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Update area-owners.md #87121
    area-Meta
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87114
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable failing multithreading debugger tests #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Block calls into managed code after a runtime assert #87043
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Implement `FlipBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js - follow up #87051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Perf blazor scenarios: Use the correct wasm sdk pack #87075
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add back fixed xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #87084
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve codegen for AVX-512 comparisons and general handling of `TYP_MASK` #87089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Open generic enumerable resolution fix #87017 #87025
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Superpmi collection for real-world benchmarks #87104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector64<T>/Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't enable ILLink analyzers for unsupported TFMs #87071
    area-Meta
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • {U}Int128 support for Utf8Formatter/Parser #86357
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle diagnostic port configuration in NativeAOT #87088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix inline decision reporting + noinline propagation #87115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update logging with processor pipeline #86995
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • update QuicConnection.ConnectAsync exceptions #87048
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd load and load scalar methods #87052
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
